page.syntax: Group_List as C = a5ws_Get_User_Assignments(C uservalue [,* Localrequest ])

argument.name: Group_List
argument.description: A list of groups to which the specified user belongs.

argument.name: uservalue
argument.description: The userid of a person in the user table.

argument.name: Localrequest
argument.description: Optional. The Request system variable. This variable explicitly passes all request variables to the function. Required if run from a web page.

page.description: Return a CR-LF delimited list of groups assigned to a particular web security user in the current project. Accepts uservalue as 'ulink' or 'userid'
page.discussion: The A5WS_Get_User_Assignments() function returns a list of the groups to which a person belongs. Limitations: Web applications only. Returns a list of groups to which a user belongs

see.ref: Returns a list of groups to which a user belongs
